purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 叙)
Pictophonetic: 余 indicates the sound; 攵 (again) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
敘述 [ xù shù ]: to relate (a story or information); to tell or talk about; to recount; narration; telling; narrative; account
敘事 [ xù shì ]: narrative
敘談 [ xù tán ]: to chat
敘舊 [ xù jiù ]: to reminisce; to talk about former times

    • 余 [ yú ] surplus, remainder; surname
    • 攵 [ pū ] to rap, to tap; script; to let go
heisig_chinese_memo: The taskmaster always wants to do a recount after buying gold so he puts it on different scales again and again.
Ru_trainchinese: xù: (глаг) повествовать; говорить; (книжн.) оценивать; (книжн.) порядок, последовательность (одинак. с 序)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Amazed at the weight of his crotch they did a recount with the scale to make sure and then conferred every honor upon him.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "攴" to " Yu ". The original meaning is order and order. "Shuowen": "Xu, second brother also. Congyun, Yu Sheng." Such as "Shang Shu. "Hong Fan": "The five are prepared, each with its description, the grass and the wild." Kong Chuan: "The five are prepared, each in the order, then the grass and the fan will nourish and abundant." "Huainan Zi. "The Classics": "The sky is covered with virtue, and the ground is filled with happiness, without losing its narrative at four o'clock, wind and rain will not bring its abuse, the sun and moon will be clear and bright, and the five stars will follow the track without losing its line."

" Sy " is used as a verb to indicate order. Such as "Zhou Li. Heaven official. "Science": "Incoming and outgoing hundreds of things with the knowledge of the general public, to narrate its wealth, receive its currency, and make it into the official currency." Zheng Xuan's note: "Surgical, Jupiter." It also specifically refers to the evaluation of official positions by rank. Such as "Northern History. "Xue Andu Biography": "I met with force in the south, met Song Xiaowu and raised Jiangzhou, so I thought it would be a general."

" Sy " also means the preface. Such as "Han Shu. "Xu Chuan", "Shu Wen Jie Zi. Syria. See " Preface ".

" Su " also means description. Such as "Mandarin. "Jin Yu": "Jiyan is used to describe it, and meaning is used to guide it." "The Family Instructions of Yan Family. "Article": "Lu Ji is the "Qigu Chapter". The first chapter describes the prosperity of mountains and rivers, and the latter chapter is ignorant of the mountains and rivers, but he loses the style." also refers to the statement. For example, Wang Xizhi's "Preface to the Collection of Orchid Pavilion": "Although there is no flourish of the silk bamboo orchestra, one chant and one chant are enough to express the secret love."

The Chu characters of the Warring States Period use the glyphs of "余" and "攴" to express the meaning of removal. Such as "Jiudian Chujian" Jian 28 "Survey (except) unknown", "Shanghai Bo II. "Congzheng (A Pian)" Jane 5 "Survey (except) ten grievances", Jane 6 "There is no way to express (except) humiliation". This is the usage of the Chu script in the Warring States Period. The Qin script uses the word " di " to express the meaning of removal.
humanum_short_description_en: From " sweep " to " Yu " sound. The original meaning is order and order.
humanum_full_description:
從「攴」，「余」聲。本義是次第、次序。《說文》：「敘，次弟也。从攴，余聲。」如《尚書．洪範》：「五者來備，各以其敘，庶草蕃廡。」孔傳：「言五者備至，各以次序，則眾草蕃滋廡豐也。」《淮南子．本經》：「是以天覆以德，地載以樂，四時不失其敘，風雨不降其虐，日月淑清而揚光，五星循軌而不失其行。」

　　「敘」作動詞表示依次排序。如《周禮．天官．司書》：「以周知入出百物，以敘其財，受其幣，使入于職幣。」鄭玄注：「敘，猶比次也。」又特指按等級次第評核官職。如《北史．薛安都傳》：「在南以武力見敘，遇宋孝武起江州，遂以為將。」

　　「敘」又表示序言。如《漢書．敘傳》、《說文解字．敘》。參見「序」。

　　「敘」還表示記述。如《國語．晉語》：「紀言以敘之，述意以導之。」《顏氏家訓．文章》：「陸機為〈齊謳篇〉，前敘山川物產風教之盛，後章忽鄙山川之情，殊失厥體。」亦指陳述。如王羲之〈蘭亭集序〉：「雖無絲竹管絃之盛，，一觴一咏，亦足以暢敘幽情。」

　　戰國楚系文字以從「余」從「攴」的字形表示去除的意思。如《九店楚簡》簡28「敘（除）不詳」、《上博二．從政（甲篇）》簡5「敘（除）十怨」、簡6「不恭則無以敘（除）辱」。此為戰國楚系文字的用法，秦系文字以「除」的字形表示去除義。
humanum_short_description: 從「攴」，「余」聲。本義是次第、次序。

敘 (Simplified: 叙)
Pinyin: xù
English Definition: abbr. for Syria 叙利亚 ; to narrate; to chat
Total strokes: 11; Radical: 攵
Pictophonetic: 余 indicates the sound; 攵 (again) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 余 [ yú ] surplus, remainder; surname
    • 攵 [ pū ] to rap, to tap; script; to let go
Example Words:
敘述 [ xù shù ]: to relate (a story or information); to tell or talk about; to recount; narration; telling; narrative; account
敘事 [ xù shì ]: narrative
敘談 [ xù tán ]: to chat
敘舊 [ xù jiù ]: to reminisce; to talk about former times

從「 攴 」，「 余 」聲。本義是次第、次序。《說文》：「敘，次弟也。从攴，余聲。」如《尚書．洪範》：「五者來備，各以其敘，庶草蕃廡。」孔傳：「言五者備至，各以次序，則眾草蕃滋廡豐也。」《淮南子．本經》：「是以天覆以德，地載以樂，四時不失其敘，風雨不降其虐，日月淑清而揚光，五星循軌而不失其行。」 「 敘 」作動詞表示依次排序。如《周禮．天官．司書》：「以周知入出百物，以敘其財，受其幣，使入于職幣。」鄭玄注：「敘，猶比次也。」又特指按等級次第評核官職。如《北史．薛安都傳》：「在南以武力見敘，遇宋孝武起江州，遂以為將。」 「 敘 」又表示序言。如《漢書．敘傳》、《說文解字．敘》。參見「 序 」。 「 敘 」還表示記述。如《國語．晉語》：「紀言以敘之，述意以導之。」《顏氏家訓．文章》：「陸機為〈齊謳篇〉，前敘山川物產風教之盛，後章忽鄙山川之情，殊失厥體。」亦指陳述。如王羲之〈蘭亭集序〉：「雖無絲竹管絃之盛，，一觴一咏，亦足以暢敘幽情。」 戰國楚系文字以從「 余 」從「 攴 」的字形表示去除的意思。如《九店楚簡》簡28「敘（除）不詳」、《上博二．從政（甲篇）》簡5「敘（除）十怨」、簡6「不恭則無以敘（除）辱」。此為戰國楚系文字的用法，秦系文字以「 除 」的字形表示去除義。

敘字的基本解释

敘
xù
同“叙”。

敘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《廣韻》徐吕切，上語，邪。］
亦作“敘1”。亦作“叙1”。
(1)次序；次第。
(2)使有次序；排列次序。
(3)按规定的等级次第授官职；按劳绩的大小给予奖励。
(4)指评议等级次第。参见“敍功”。
(5)头绪；条理。
(6)陈述；记述。
(7)发抒；叙谈。
(8)序；序言。文体之一种。
(9)指写序。

敘字的康熙字典解释
敘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
敘字的起名意思

暂无。

xù

Narrate
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xù］
["Guangyun" Xu Lvqie, Shangyu, evil. ]
Also known as "Syria 1". Also known as "Syria 1".
(1) Order; order.
(2) Make an order; arrange the order.
(3) Official positions shall be awarded according to the prescribed level; rewards shall be given according to the size of the work performance.
(4) Refers to the review rank. See "Xinggong".
(5) Clue; organization.
(6) Statement; description.
(7) Express; talk about.
(8) Preface; Preface. A kind of style.
(9) Refers to the writing sequence.
